tool_description: Validates carrier availability and service types for specific origin-destination pairs and package requirements.

carrier_codes.description: List of carrier codes to validate (e.g., UPS, FEDEX, USPS)

error_messages: Invalid carrier code: Provide recognized carrier codes (UPS, FEDEX, USPS, DHL, etc.)
Invalid postal code format: Ensure ZIP codes follow proper format for the respective country
Carrier service unavailable: Selected carrier does not service the specified route
usage: Provide carrier_codes, origin_zip, and destination_zip to validate which carriers can service the shipping route.

valid_carriers.description: List of carriers that can service this route

invalid_carriers.description: List of carriers that cannot service this route
